abstract: A battle for control of Trump Entertainment Resorts could turn personal, The New York Post suggested, after activist investor Carl C. Icahn jumped into the fray on Friday.
snippet: A battle for control of Trump Entertainment Resorts could turn personal, The New York Post suggested, after activist investor Carl C. Icahn jumped into the fray on Friday.
lead_paragraph: A battle for control of Trump Entertainment Resorts could turn personal, The New York Post suggested, after activist investor Carl C. Icahn jumped into the fray Friday.

headline.main: Will Fight for Trump Casinos Get Personal?
